welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dembeni, Mayotte! Known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in the charm of our city and enjoy all that it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dzaoudzi Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dzaoudzi Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
